settings.title: Our Top Selling Custom Recipe Towels
1. Take a Photo of Your Recipe & Place Your Order
settings.fd: Take a photo or full color scan of your recipe. You will upload it when placing adding your product to cart.

settings.title: 2. We Email you a Proof for Approval
settings.fd: Our designers create a preview of your print and email it to you for approval. You may request changes.

settings.title: 3. Your Order is Printed & Shipped
settings.fd: After your proof is approved your order is shipped in 2-4 business days.

settings.testimonial: "It was amazing to see the writing of my mom and sister and the distorted background completely gone. Amazing job. Thank you!"
settings.author: Sandra M

settings.testimonial: "I was able to get gift shopping done for my entire family without ever leaving my home. Thank you for creating these special gifts that my children and grandchildren will treasure!"
settings.author: Lynn C

settings.testimonial: "I am thrilled to have ordered a kitchen towel (actually, three) with a very special family recipe for Tea Cakes.. I was even more thrilled when I saw that you are in Nashville!..Thank you."
settings.author: Susan H

settings.testimonial: "Thank you for your product. The collection of kitchen towels that I gave to my daughters for Christmas are treasured by them all."
settings.author: Maggie B

settings.testimonial:
"I just received my order and could not be more pleased!
Thank you not only for lovely keepsakes and special gifts but, also for your consistent communication and assistance. Your customer service is greatly appreciated."
settings.author: Julia V
